Posit Connect (2)
Posit Package Manager (2)
Posit Workbench (2)

Company XYZ has Posit Team: Posit Workbench, Posit Connect, Posit Package Manager available across the organization. To request access, please contact: sales@posit.co (insert your own company contact)


Once you have access to the tools, you can access each of them below:


Posit Workbench
Posit Workbench offers all of the capabilities found in the RStudio desktop IDE plus professional database drivers, the ability to manage multiple R and Python versions and sessions, as well as Jupyter Notebooks, JupyterLab, VSCode, and more.
Posit Workbench

Posit Connect
Share applications (including Shiny, Flask, and Dash), reports, dashboards, APIs, and so much more
Posit Connect

Posit Package Manager
Posit Package Manager is a repository management server to organize and centralize R and Python packages across our organization.
Posit Package Manager
